accountId.description: The financial organisation’s own unique reference number for the investor’s LISA account.

creationReason.description: The reason the account was created

firstSubscriptionDate.description: The date of the first deposit into the account - if this is a transfer, use the date of deposit into the account managed by the previous organisation. This can't be in the future.

accountStatus.description: Status of the account that has been created.

transferAccount.description: If the creationReason is ‘Transferred’, then this is required.

transferredFromAccountId.description: The previous financial organisation’s own unique reference number for the investor’s LISA account.

transferredFromLMRN.description: The number given to the LISA provider when they applied for approval from HMRC.

transferInDate.description: The date the account transferred from the previous provider to the new one. This can't be in the future.
